title: Traditional roast beef fillet
ingredients: ['2 carrots, thickly sliced', '4 cloves garlic, crushed', '5 sprigs thyme', '1 small onion, cut into wedges', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1.25kg (2 1/2 lb) beef fillet', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '175ml (6 fl oz) red wine', '200ml (7 fl oz) water']
